text: Kim Shin-young (Hangul: 김신영; born 10 July 1975) is a South Korean retired badminton player. Played for the Jeonbuk bank, she competed at the 1996 Atlanta Olympic Games and 1998 Bangkok Asian Games. == Achievements == === World Cup === Women's doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !
